description:
**Update Alert - You can now add 7 of your own custom responsibility tags**
This delightfully whimsical app helps you track your children's weekly chores. Choose between a variety of Responsibility Tags and mark each day's progress with a smiley face (task completion) or a sad face (not complete). The chore chart applies 1 point for every completed task which is applied towards your point goal. A sad face subtracts a point. 

This app is an excellent motivational tool to get your kids to do their chores. They will love being able to mark their progress on your Palm Pre and watch as they get closer and closer to their reward. The piggybank also teaches them the value of saving as they work toward building up enough funds for that special something they've had their eyes on.

Get this app today and your children will see how fun completing their chores can be! 
**Send us your requests for additional chores so that we can add them to the app**
versionNote: All 7 responsibility tags are customizable. Customized tags no longer reset on sundays. More responsibility image tags added. Update checker added.
